meaningMnemonic: If you spill something <radical>red</radical> on yourself in <radical>winter</radical> you should <kanji>pardon</kanji> yourself immediately and try to find something else to wear. It's very dangerous to wear red in winter, and even if it seems rude, make sure you pardon yourself right away and get that taken care of!
